participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

bpmt_q1.Description: Acts too young for his/her age. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q2.Description: Argues a lot. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q3.Description: Fails to finish things he/she starts. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q4.Description: Can't concentrate, can't pay attention for long. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q9.Description: Impulsive or acts without thinking. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q10.Description: Too fearful or anxious. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q11.Description: Feels too guilty. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q12.Description: Self-conscious or easily embarrassed. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q13.Description: Inattentive or easily distracted. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

Levels.0: Not True (as far as you know)

bpmt_q14.Description: Stubborn, sullen, or irritable. | 0 = Not True (as far as you know); 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True

bpm_t_scr_attention_r.Description: Raw Score:  bpmt_q1 plus  bpmt_q3 plus  bpmt_q4 plus  bpmt_q5 plus  bpmt_q9 plus  bpmt_q13 Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_t_scr_attention_t.Description: T-Score | T scores are based on the "r" score and the sex at birth (male or female) of the child

bpm_t_ss_attention_mean.Description: Mean: Mean(bpmt_q1 plus  bpmt_q3 plus  bpmt_q4 plus  bpmt_q5 plus  bpmt_q9 plus  bpmt_q13); Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_t_scr_internal_r.Description: Raw Score: bpmt_q8 plus  bpmt_q10 plus  bpmt_q11 plus  bpmt_q12 plus  bpmt_q17 plus  bpmt_q18); Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_t_ss_internal_mean.Description: Mean: Mean(bpmt_q8 plus  bpmt_q10 plus  bpmt_q11 plus  bpmt_q12 plus  bpmt_q17 plus  bpmt_q18); Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_t_scr_external_r.Description: Raw Score: bpmt_q2 plus  bpmt_q6 plus  bpmt_q7 plus  bpmt_q14 plus  bpmt_q15 plus  bpmt_q16; Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_t_ss_external_mean.Description: Mean: Mean(bpmt_q2 plus  bpmt_q6 plus  bpmt_q7 plus  bpmt_q14 plus  bpmt_q15 plus  bpmt_q16); Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_t_scr_totalprob_r.Description: Raw Score: bpmt_q1 plus  bpmt_q2 plus  bpmt_q3 plus  bpmt_q4 plus  bpmt_q5 plus  bpmt_q6 plus  bpmt_q7 plus  bpmt_q8 plus  bpmt_q9 plus  bpmt_q10 plus  bpmt_q11 plus  bpmt_q12 plus  bpmt_q13 plus  bpmt_q14 plus  bpmt_q15 plus  bpmt_q16 plus bpmt_q17 plus  bpmt_q18; Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_t_ss_totalprob_mean.Description: Mean: Mean(bpmt_q1 plus  bpmt_q2 plus  bpmt_q3 plus  bpmt_q4 plus bpmt_q5 plus  bpmt_q6 plus  bpmt_q7 plus  bpmt_q8 plus bpmt_q9 plus  bpmt_q10 plus  bpmt_q11 plus  bpmt_q12 plus bpmt_q13 plus  bpmt_q14 plus  bpmt_q15 plus  bpmt_q16 plus bpmt_q17 plus  bpmt_q18); Validation: All items must be answered
